bug.author: saaddia
bug.description: All of these terms appear during transfer learning training "" 'Epoch', 'Batch', 'xy', 'wh', 'conf', 'cls', 'total', 'nTargets', 'time' "" can any one tell what xy , wh ,conf, clas , total, ntragets ?

comments.comment: These are losses for x and y of the box centers, width and height of the boxes, object confidence, class confidence, total loss and number of targets per batch.
